doc: Templates Documentation broken on Laravel website

The template inheritance docs on [http://laravel.com/docs/4.2/templates](http://laravel.com/docs/4.2/templates) have the word `@parent` missing throughout the **Using A Blade Layout** section. However on the same docs page on github [https://github.com/laravel/docs/blob/4.2/templates.md#using-a-blade-layout](https://github.com/laravel/docs/blob/4.2/templates.md#using-a-blade-layout) they seem to show just fine.
Markdown parsing problem on the website maybe?
